name: International ESP Conference: Convergence of ESP with other disciplines
content: International ESP Conference Convergence of ESP with other disciplines Date: 27-28 October 2017 Venue: Liverpool Hope University, Liverpool, UK Extended Submission: before 1 September 2017 Website: http://www.esptassociation.com | Email: esp@teachers.org We have received many proposals and emails from those who have just missed the deadline. After long consideration, we have decided to make a second call for papers. PAPER SUBMISSION, REVIEW PROCESS AND ACCEPTANCE NOTICE Authors can send their abstract for an oral presentation or workshop which must contain; authorsâ€™ names affiliation title of the paper contact information including email All abstracts and /or full papers will be blind reviewed and the notification of acceptance will be given within 5 days after we receive the submission. Please send your abstract (in MS Word file format ONLY) before or by 1 September 2017 to esp@teachers.org
